name: Cuffed
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

After fighting when they weren't supposed to, this duo found themselves stuck together by a magic chain and must work together to find someone who can free them.

CONTROLS

Movement: WASD and ESDF (deliberately bound so that they affect each other)

Attack: Q and R (Q for the Mage, R for the Warrior)

If you get stuck, press K. It'll skip the level lol

There is a bug that happens when you wedge a wall between the suo so. Try not to do that.

CREDITS

Art: HonorJ - Hobbyist, Digital Artist | DeviantArt (Discord: @Honor J#8897)

Dungeon Generator: Random Dungeon Generator (dungeonstome.com)

Music: Free Fantasy RPG Music Pack by Platonic Game Studio (itch.io)

Sound Effects: Kenney • Home
